author: Joerg Meyer
description: Joerg makes this cocktail using Bacardi Neo but it also works well with the easier to obtain Bacardi Carta Blanca. If you haven't any Sexy Bitters then try with a dash of orange bitters.
name: White Old Fashioned
recipeIngredient: 60 ml White (charcoal-filtered) 1-4 year old light rum

recipeInstructions.text: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass

video.description: Joerg makes this cocktail using Bacardi Neo but it also works well with the easier to obtain Bacardi Carta Blanca. If you haven't any Sexy Bitters then try with a dash of orange bitters.
video.name: HOWTO make White Old Fashioned
